ext_description.p: An angular_dimensional_size is a type of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the shall not be equal 'angular'.

ext_description.p:
An auxiliary_characteristic_dimension_representation is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of where the ARM attribute has a value of TRUE.
A curve_dimension is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
The name of the curve_dimension shall not be 'angular'.
A datum_difference is a type of and that implements the ARM concept of
The datum_difference shall be applied to only .
The datum_difference name attribute inherited shall be identical in each supertypes.
The datum_difference description attribute inherited shall be identical in each supertypes.
The datum_difference shall be applied to only different .
The datum_difference shall not be in a complex instance of other types of or .
A datum_difference_based_characteristic is a type of that implements the ARM concept of
The datum_difference_based_characteristic shall be related to exactly one .
A dimensional_size_property is a type of and a .
An edge_segment_vertex is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
The edge_segment_vertex shall not participate in a complex instance of other than with the supertype.
The edge_segment_vertex shall be related to one representation with a name of 'shape element characterization'.
The edge_segment_vertex shall be in the 'physical design occurrence' or 'physical design usage' context.
The edge_segment_vertex shall be a single datum.
A geometric_tolerance_group is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of and .
The geometric_tolerance_group shall have a description of either 'separate requirement' or 'simultaneous requirement'.

If the geometric_tolerance_group has a description of 'separate requirement', the geometric_tolerance_group shall relate to at least one geometric_tolerance_with_specified_datum_system to specify the 'group geometric tolerance'.

If the geometric_tolerance_group has a description of 'simultaneous requirement', the geometric_tolerance_group shall relate to at least two physical_unit_geometric_tolerances to specify the 'group geometric tolerance'.

If the geometric_tolerance_group has a description of 'separate requirement', the geometric_tolerance_group shall relate to exactly zero with a name of 'linear profile refinement' to specify the 'group geometric tolerance'.

If the geometric_tolerance_group has a description of 'separate requirement', the geometric_tolerance_group shall relate to exactly zero with a name of 'surface profile refinement' to specify the 'group geometric tolerance'.

If the geometric_tolerance_group has a description of 'separate requirement', the geometric_tolerance_group shall relate to exactly zero with a name of 'feature relating position' to specify the 'group geometric tolerance'.

If the geometric_tolerance_group has a description of 'separate requirement', the geometric_tolerance_group shall relate to exactly zero , to specify the 'group geometric tolerance', that are not either , , or .
An opposing_boundary_dimensional_size is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
The name of the opposing_boundary_dimensional_size shall be either 'angular' or 'linear'.
A physical_unit_datum is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:
The physical_unit_datum shall have a description of 'axis', 'plane', 'point' or 'null'.
The physical_unit_datum shall not lie on the boundary of the shape of the product.
The physical_unit_datum shall have a name of 'single datum', 'common datum', or 'null'.
If the name of the physical_unit_datum is 'common datum' it shall be related to at least one datum system as a 'datum usage in datum system'.
If the name of the physical_unit_datum is 'common datum', it shall relate to at least two to specify the 'datum feature usage in common datum'.

If the description of the physical_unit_datum is 'axis' and the physical_unit_datum is not related to a datum reference frame as a 'reference axis', it shall have a name of either 'common datum' or 'single datum'.

If the description of the physical_unit_datum is 'plane' and the physical_unit_datum is not related to a datum reference frame as a 'reference plane', it shall have a name of either 'common datum' or 'single datum'.

If the description of the physical_unit_datum is 'point' and the physical_unit_datum is not related to a datum reference frame as a 'reference origin', it shall have a name of either 'common datum' or 'single datum'.
If the name of the physical_unit_datum is 'single datum', it shall be related to at least one datum system as a 'datum usage in datum system'.
If the name of the physical_unit_datum is 'single datum', it shall relate to no more than one to specify the 'datum feature usage in single datum'.
The name and description of the physical_unit_datum shall not both be an empty string.
If the description of the physical_unit_datum is 'plane', it shall have at most two property_definitions with the description of 'datum direction property'.
A physical_unit_datum_feature is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
The physical_unit_datum_feature shall have exactly one property that has the description of 'datum feature identification'.
The physical_unit_datum_feature shall be related by at least one with a name of either 'datum feature usage in common datum' or 'datum feature usage in single datum'.
The physical_unit_datum_feature shall be related to at most one as a 'datum feature usage in single datum'.
A physical_unit_datum_target_set is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
The physical_unit_datum_target_set shall relate to at least one to specify the 'datum target usage'.
The physical_unit_datum_target_set shall not be related to a as a 'constituent'.
A physical_unit_geometric_tolerance is a type of and a that implements the ARM concepts of:
The value of two name attributes of the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance shall be identical.
The specified as the definition of the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance shall be the same specified as the by the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance.
If the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance is neither a , a , nor a , the name of the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance shall be either 'circularity', 'cylindricity', 'flatness', or 'straightness'.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: If the name of the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance is 'circularity', it shall not be a .
If the name of the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance is 'cylindricity', it shall not be a .
If the name of the physical_unit_geometric_tolerance is 'flatness', it shall not be a .
The physical_unit_geometric_tolerance shall be related to at most one with a description of 'simultaneous requirement' as the 'group geometric tolerance'.

ext_description.p: A positional_boundary is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:
The positional_boundary shall have a description of either 'dimension related positional boundary' or 'profile related positional boundary'.
The positional_boundary shall not lie on the boundary of the shape of the product.
If the description of the positional_boundary is 'dimension related positional boundary', the positional_boundary shall relate to at least one to specify the 'boundary member'.

If the description of the positional_boundary is 'dimension related positional boundary', the positional_boundary shall either relate to exactly one that lies on the boundary of the shape of the product to specify the 'constrained feature' or relate to exactly one to specify the 'constrained feature'.

If the description of the positional_boundary is 'dimension related positional_boundary', the positional_boundary shall have exactly one that has the description of 'dimension related positional boundary property'.

If the description of the positional_boundary is 'profile related positional boundary', the positional_boundary shall have exactly one that has the description of 'profile related positional boundary property'.
If the description of the positional_boundary is 'profile related positional boundary' it shall relate to exactly one to specify the 'positional boundary and profile boundary member'.
A positional_boundary_member is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
The positional_boundary_member shall not lie on the boundary of the shape of the product.
The positional_boundary_member shall have exactly one that has the description of 'positional boundary member property'.
The positional_boundary_member shall be related to exactly one as the 'boundary member', and that shall have a description of 'dimension related positional boundary'.
A statistical_dimensional_location is a type of that implements the combination of the ARM concepts , and .
A statistical_dimensional_size is a type of that implements the combination of the ARM concepts , and .
The statistical_dimensional_size shall be related to at most one as the 'substitutable dimension'.
The statistical_dimensional_size shall relate to a to specify the 'dimensional tolerance statistical control requirement'.
If the statistical_dimensional_size is related to a , as the 'substitutable dimension', that shall not be a statistical_dimensional_size.
A statistical_geometric_tolerance is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
The statistical_geometric_tolerance shall be related to at most one as the 'substitutable geometric tolerance'.
The statistical_geometric_tolerance shall relate to exactly one to specify the 'geometric tolerance statistical control requirement'.
The statistical_geometric_tolerance shall be related to exactly zero statistical_geometric_tolerance as the 'substitutable geometric tolerance'.
A tolerance_zone_boundary is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:
If the description of the tolerance_zone_boundary is 'conical', it shall not be either a or a .
If the description of the tolerance_zone_boundary is 'circular or cylindrical or spherical', it shall not be either a or a .
The tolerance_zone_boundary shall not lie on the boundary of the shape of the product.
The tolerance_zone_boundary shall not be both a and a .
The tolerance_zone_boundary shall have exactly one that has the description of either 'boundary zone definition with specified size' or 'conical tolerance zone boundary'.
The tolerance_zone_boundary shall be specified as the boundaries by exactly one .

A tolerance_zone_explicit_opposing_boundary_set is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of
and .
A tolerance_zone_implicit_opposing_boundary_set is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
The viewing_plane is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .
The viewing_plane shall have a description of 'affected plane'.
The viewing_plane shall have exactly one that has the description of 'viewing plane property'.
The viewing_plane shall not lie on the boundary of the shape of the product.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The boundary_size_characteristic_constraint rule constrains the use of a representation when it is used as a boundary size characteristic.

ext_description.p: Each representation with a name of either 'diametrical boundary size' or 'opposing boundary set size' shall contain exactly one that has a name of 'tolerance value'.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The directed_axis_constraint rule constrains the use of a when it is used as a directed axis.

ext_description.p: Each that has a description of 'directed axis' shall relate to exactly one that has a description of 'axis' to specify its 'derived axis'.
Each that has a description of 'directed axis' shall relate to exactly one to specify its 'end shape aspect'.
Each that has a description of 'directed axis' shall relate to exactly one to specify its 'start shape aspect'.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The directed_axis_unique_constraint rule constrains the population members, that fill the role of ARM , so that the combination of ARM and ARM attributes shall be unique within the population

ext_description.p: Every instance of with a description of 'derived axis' must have a unique combination of and entities where the is related to the by a with a name of 'derived axis' and the is related to the by a with a name of 'start shape aspect'.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The direction_element_constraint rule constrains the use of a when it is used as a direction element.

ext_description.p: Each instance of that has a description of 'direction element' shall relate to exactly one that has a description of 'datum direction property' to specify its 'element direction vector'.
Each instance of that has a description of 'direction element' shall relate to exactly one that has a description of 'datum direction property' to specify its 'half datum plane direction vector'.
Each instance of that has a description of 'direction element' shall be related as a 'direction component' to at least one that has a description of 'datum based vector orientation'.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The edge_segment_vertex_constraint rule constrains the and population members to satisfy the requirements of the ARM object .

ext_description.p: Each shall be referenced by two different segments for the same edge, where the types of the two segments shall be the same.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The edge_segment_vertex_unique_constraint rule constrains the population members, that fill the role of ARM , to have unique ARM name attributes.

ext_description.p: Every instance of with a name of 'single datum' must have unique description attributes on entities that are the first entry in the .items attribute of entities that have said entities as the 's .defintion attribute.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The geometric_tolerance_qualifier_constraint rule constrains the use of a when it is used as a geometric tolerance qualifier.

ext_description.p: Each that has a name of either 'predefined geometric tolerance qualifier' or 'user defined geometric tolerance qualifier' shall have a that is a that is the magnitude of a least one .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The positional_boundary_member_definition_constraint rule constrains the use of a when it is used as a positional boundary member definition.

ext_description.p: Each instance of that has a description of 'positional boundary member property' shall be a of a .
Each instance of that has a description of 'positional boundary member property' shall relate to exactly one to specify its 'boundary member associated dimension'.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The positional_boundary_offset_constraint rule constrains the use of a when it is used as a positional boundary offset.

ext_description.p: Each instance of that has a description of 'positional boundary offset' shall be a of a that has a name of 'positional boundary and profile boundary member'.

Each instance of that has a description of 'positional boundary offset' shall be related as a 'boundary offset' to exactly one that has a description of 'profile related positional boundary property'.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The profile_related_positional_boundary_definition_constraint rule constrains the use of a when it is used as a profile related positional boundary definition.

ext_description.p: Each instance of that has a description of 'profile related positional boundary property' shall be a of a that has a description of 'profile related positional boundary'.

Each instance of that has a description of 'profile related positional boundary property' shall relate to exactly one that has a description of 'positional boundary offset' to specify its 'boundary offset'.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The projected_zone_and_base_relationship_constraint rule constrains the use of a when it is used as a projected zone and base relationship.

ext_description.p: Each shall have a that either is a or is on the boundary of the surface of the product.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The projected_zone_height_characteristic_constraint rule constrains the use of a when it is used as a projected zone height characteristic.

ext_description.p: Each shall have a that is a .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The restraint_condition_constraint rule constrains the use of a when it is used as a restraint condition.

ext_description.p: Each instance of that has a description of either 'restraint' or 'tolerance specific restraint' shall relate to exactly one to specify its 'restraint description'.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The shape_element_deriving_relationship_unique_constraint rule constrains population members, that fill the role of ARM , to have unique shape elements on each shape element.

ext_description.p: Every instance of that has a common must have a unique attribute value.
Every instance of shall be at most one of or .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The subtype_exclusive_dimensional_size rule requires all entities to be at most one of , or ; and at most one of , or .

ext_description.p: Every instance of shall be at most one of , or and at most one of , or .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The subtype_mandatory_geometric_tolerance rule requires all entities to be .

ext_description.p: Every instance of shall be a .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The subtype_mandatory_runout_zone_orientation rule requires all entities to be .

ext_description.p: Every instance of shall be a .

If the linear_profile_tolerance has a name of 'linear profile refinement', it shall be related as the 'linear profile refining control' to exactly one linear_profile_tolerance with a name of either 'linear profile locating' or 'linear profile refinement'.

If the linear_profile_tolerance has a name of 'linear profile locating', it shall relate to exactly one linear_profile_tolerance with a name of 'linear profile refinement' to specify the 'linear profile refining control'.

If the linear_profile_tolerance is not a geometric_tolerance_with_specified_datum_system and has a name of 'linear profile refinement', it shall relate to exactly zero linear_profile_tolerance with a name of 'linear profile refinement' to specify the 'linear profile refining control'.

If the linear_profile_tolerance has a name of 'linear profile refinement', it shall relate to at most one linear_profile_tolerance with a name of 'linear profile refinement' to specify the 'linear profile refining control'.
The linear_profile_tolerance shall not be a .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The subtype_mandatory_extended_geometric_tolerance rule requires all to be .
Every instance of shall be .
